briefTitle: Comparative Performance of PureVision Lens Designs
officialTitle: A Study to Evaluate the Product Performance of the Redesigned Bausch & Lomb PureVision® Contact Lens (Test) Compared to the Currently Marketed Bausch & Lomb PureVision® Contact Lens (Control) When Worn on an Extended Wear Basis.

interventions.name: Alternate Design of the PureVision Contact Lens.

summary: The objective of this study is to evaluate the performance of the PureVision Lens designs when worn on a 30-day continuous wear basis

primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Measured at screening/dispensing visit, 1 day, 1 week and 1 month follow-up visits
